inn1.comm: Pollock hits his trademark good length and line with his first ball, it cuts away from the batsman after pitching just outside off stump, Hafeez lets it go
and again, consistency from the word go, pitches on an immaculate length and seams away from the right-hander, left alone through to Boucher
good length ball on off stump that shapes away from the right-hander, left alone again
Pollock bowls this a lot wider and moves it away from Hafeez who resists the temptation to chase it and shoulders arms
that's five in a row now, Hafeez is showing patience and Pollock is showing machine like discipline

and caught! Pollock strikes in trademark fashion, he teased Hafeez with the first five balls by moving them away from a good length, this time he bowls it a little fuller, drawing Hafeez forward and inducing the drive, the movement off the pitch drew the edge and Boucher takes a simple catch
Nazir doesn't show the patience Hafeez did, he slashes hard at a short and wide out from Ntini and gets beaten, that was far too wide and he should have left that
he shows more restraint this time, he lets another wide ball go through to Boucher
once more, Ntini is getting considerable lift outside the off stump  and Nazir watches it go through
shot! Ntini bowls it a fraction too full, Nazir leans on the front foot and drives elegantly through the covers, thatw as very easy on the eyes
Ntini adjusts his length shorter and angles it into the right-hander, Nazir plays it on the back foot and blocks
banged in short and down leg side, Nazir moves across and pulls it to fine leg, the batsmen assume its going to reach the fence but Pollock makes an outstanding save, poor running
short of  alength ball angling into Younis Khan from outside off stump, he gets on to the back foot and blocks to cover
Pollock strays a fraction on to middle stump and Nazir moves across and turns it through square leg, the run quickly this time and get a single
back on target is Pollock, in the corridor outside off stump, Younis lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
straighter line on off stump, Pollock pins Younis on the back foot with a short length, defended towards cover on the back foot
and again, Pollock can bowl this line in his sleep, Younis lets it go through to Boucher
Pollock extracts a bit of bounce on this occasion, Younis has to stand on his toes to defend that down on the off side
defended on the back foot towards cover again, another miserly Pollock over
short of  alength ball angling into Nazir from over the wicket, defended on the back foot
Ntini roars a confident shout for lbw, Nazir tried to flick but missed the shot, he got hit on the back leg in front of off and middle stump, the only doubt could have been the height, close call
Jags back into Nazir from outside off stump, he gets cramped for room and fends it towards square leg
SENSATIONAL! Pollock delivers it outside off and Nazir picks it up to swat it way, way, way over square leg for a huge six. It was pre-medidated but it was simply out of the world
Drifting donw leg, quite a bit of bounce too but Nazir just flicks it away for a four to fine leg. Leg-byes signalled
Firmly blocked on the front foot

Full ball from Pollock, on off stump. Nazir tries to pick it towards the leg side, trying to swivel across, but only manages to get a thin inside edge onto the pads. Batsmen scamper through for a quick single
Classical Pollock jaffa. Drifting in from over the wicket and nipping away after pitching. Younis pushes tentatively but is beaten all ends up.
Fended away to the off side off the back foot
smashed! Ntini bowls it too full and Nazir crashes it off the front foot wide of mid-off for four, that rocketer to the fence
Nazir goes for it again but this time he mis-hits it and skies it safely over extra cover, he needs to keep his cool here
not that short at all but Nazir tried to pull it through midwicket, it was too quick for him and he didn't connect
there are two slips in waiting but Nazir manages to steer a short and high ball from outside off stump down to third man for a single, bit too much risk involved for my liking
Younis tries to flick a full ball thats angling into him but misses and gets hit on the pad, Boucher appeals for lbw but Ntini knows that it was missing leg
good length and line outside off stump, Younis lets it go through to Boucher
pitches short of a length on off stump and gives Nazir absolutely nothing to work with, he defends it back to Pollock on the front foot
dropped! Pollock drifts down leg side and Nazir lofts it off his pads, Charl Langeveldt runs in from the fine leg fence and spills a flat catch, will that prove costly?
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
a fraction shorter that Pollock would like and Younis gets into position on the back foot and square drives through cover point, they scurry through for three
short of a length on off stump, pushed firmly to cover on the back foot

Pollock gets his man! Nazir tries to play the same hoick that earlier resulted in a six over midwicket, this time he gets the bottom half of the bat on it and sends the ball soaring high high into the air, Pollock calls for it and waits for what seems like an eternity before taking a steepling catch
pitches on a good length and jags back into the right-hander, the batsman lets it go close to off stump
defended on the front foot with bat and pad close together, Akmal is covering the sharp angle that Ntini gets back into the right-hander by going wide of the crease
he beats him this time, that was fast and just outside the off stump, Akmal hung his bat out at it and the ball whizzes past the edge
Akmal hops on to the back foot and steers and short of a length ball down to third man to get off the mark
too short, far too short, Younis rocks back, swivels and pulls, the next thing you see is the ball smacking the boundary boards at midwicket
a sublime cover drive follows the powerful pull, Ntini overcompensates by bowling too full outside the off stump, Younis leans forward and drives through covers for four more
Pollock continues to peg away at off stump by pushign the batsman on the back foot, Akmal defends towards cover point but it looked far from convincing
Akmal tries to force it off the back foot through the offside, doesn't time it well at all and bottom edges it
Pollock strays on to middle and leg stump, Akmal jumps back and plays it through midwicket
full ball on the pads yet again, Younis flicks off his toes through square leg
good length ball just outside the off stump, Akmal pushes hard at it on the front foot and runs it down to third man
short of a length ball on off and middle stump, the length forces Younis to go on the back foot and push to mid-on
full and wide outside the off stump, that swung a fair bit and Akmal chased it but wasn't close to making contact
much straighter this time, on off and middle, Akmal plays it to midwicket
too short and too wide, Akmal stands tall on the back foot and smashes it hard at Gibbs at point who moves to his right and saves a certain boundary
good length ball on off and middle stump, Younis moves forward and plays it back to the bowler
slightly shorter and outside off stump, Younis moves back and tries to force it through the off side but doesn't time it well
fuller length on off stump, Hall is getting the ball to swing away from the right-hander, Younis reaches out for it on the front foot and plays it to Gibbs at point
slower ball, fullish length on off stump, Younis once again gets on to the front foot and defends to Gibbs
Pollock bowls it in his favourite area outside the off stump, Akmal tries to defend but gets beaten
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
fuller length just outside off stump, Akmal moves back and tries to play the square drive through cover point but find the timing
this time he finds it but misses out on the placement, he gets on the back foot and punches straight to the man at cover
beauty! Pollock sneaks past the outside edge, Akmal pushes forward to one that pitches on off stump and straightens just enough to beat the bat, better batsmen would have got beaten by that
Akmal tries to flick but gets a leading edge through covers where AB de Villiers dives over the ball to allow a couple of runs, Pollock isn't amused
driven towards cover on the front foot, Younis has looked in good nick out there
poor ball for the length was short and the line was wide outside off stump, Younis blasts it over Gibbs, who leaps with one hand trying to catch it , at point for four
driven firmly once again but straight to mid-off
Hall drops it a bit short, Younis gets into position in a flash and pulls in front of midwicket, in most cases that would have been four but Ashwell Prince chases it with unbelieveable speed
nothing shot from Akmal, Pollock keeps it in the channel outside off stump, Akmal doesn't move his feet and throws his bat at it, he's lucky not to edge that
too full from Hall and Akmal drives on the front foot to mid-off
short of  a length ball outside off stump, Younis tries to steer it past Gibbs at point but Gibbs moves to his left and pounces
fuller length on off stump, Younis leans forward and drives to mid-off

bowled him! Pollock does what he has been doing almost every ball, bowls it on a superb length and line outside off stump, Younis plays away from his body and tries to drive, he gets a thick inside edge and the ball uproots the off stump
Yousuf is greeted by one that hits a good length adn seams away from him from just outside off stump, he watchfully lets it go
cuts him in half! Pollock brings one back into the right-hander, Yousuf was playign for the one that moves away, the ball bounces a bit more and flies over the top of off and middle stump
Yousuf comes back with such elegance, he gets forward to a fuller delivery and caresses it through cover, that was gentle and superb
driven wide of the man at mid-off for a single

Hall angles the ball into middle and leg, Yousuf dabs it to midwicket adn sets off for a single, quicksilver Prince charges in, pick up and throws, had he hit at the bowler's end it would have been very close
defended to the off side on the front foot
a touch too short and wide outside off stump, Akmal slashes and slashes hard, the ball flies over first slip and races to the fence
driven uppishly on the front foot to mid-off

outstanding shot! Hall bowls it a bit fuller and swings it away from the right-hander, Akmal gets on to the front foot and plays the square drive to perfection, the splits the gap between Gibbs and de Villers and gets four for that lovely shot
good length ball on off stump, Yousuf plays it off the back foot to cover
Pollock strays on to middle and leg, yousuf moves across but wasn't balanced properly as he tried to flick, he'll be disappointed with hitting that to midwicket
left alone outside the off stump, Pollock switches back to his customary method of attack
good length ball on off stump, Yousuf defends it towards cover on the back foot
Pollock bowls that at 129 kmh and moves it away from Yousuf from outside off stump, the batsman lets it go through to Boucher

Pollock gets his fourth! He pitches that just outside off stump and angles it into Yousuf who fell over a little as he tried to flick, the ball hit him in front of middle stump, Rudi Koertzen answers the confident appeal with the slow raise of his index finger
short and wide outside off stump, I think even I could have hit that, Akmal stands tall on the back foot and smashes it to the point fence
this one is a lot better, Langeveldt gets it to boucne sharply just outside off stump, Akmal tries to cut once again but gets beaten
defended on the back foot back to the bowler
driven uppishly off the back foot, that bounced just short of Gibbs at point
Langeveldt is getting the ball to skid back into Akmal who waits on the back foot and blocks
Langeveldt gets away with a short and wide out, Akmal reaches out for it and tries to cut through cover point but the ball hit the bottom of the bat and went straight to Gibbs
Pollock bowls it full and straight on off stump, Inzamam moves across his stumps and drives to cover
shorter in length just outside off stump, Inzamam moves back and across and punches to cover on the back foot
Pollock drifts on to middle and leg, Inzamam moves across and forces it off his pads to Prince at midwicket
good shot but no reward, Inzamam forward forward and drove firmly to mid-on, he hit that on the up and off the middle of the bat
Inzamam leans across his stumps once more to drive to mid-off, he needs to be a bit careful here for Pollock is looking to trap him leg before

Pollock has five out of five! He bowls that just outside off stump and the ball rears sharly off a good length, Inzamam tries to cut but the ball is far too close to the body and the bounce cramps him for room, he edges it to Kallis who takes a sharp catch above his head at second slip
Langeveldt over-steps and Akmal moves on to the back foot to cut to point
good length ball outside off stump, Malik moves forward and defends on the off side
short of a length on off and middle stump, Malik moves back in his crease and defends to midwicket
good length ball on off stump, Malik plays the off drive on the move and hits it on the up to mid-off
short of a length this time just outside off stump, Malik jumps up and defends towards the leg side
driven on the up once again to AB de Villiers at cover, Malik has been hitting it well, just not found the gaps yet
quicker ball on off stump, Malik plays on the back foot and defends to the off side
Angling down leg side, tucked away behind square for a quick single
back of a length, rising after pitching. Malik gets on the back foot and blocks it firmly
similar length delivery, slightly wide of off stump. Malik shuffles across the stumps and defends cautiously. Bowling machine Pollock seems to be well oiled today
fuller this time. Malik pushes it firmly to the cover region. No run though
Fuller again. Malik in position quickly and pushes it in the extra-cover gap this time. Hurries a quick single

full and wide outside off. Akmal shoulders arms and the Wanderers stands up to applaud a super spell from Shaun McLean Pollock. 10 overs, 3 maidens, 22 runs, 5 wickets. Thank you, good night, good luck
Full from Langeveldt. Malik blocks confidently
Full and straight. Keeps a shade low but Malik keeps his eye on the ball and keeps it out in the last moment. Had he missed it, Langeveldt would have gone up surely
Oh! Nearly disaster. Taps it to the off side and watches the ball as the non-striker takes off. Could have been extremely tight had the throw been quicker
Drifting down leg, turned away elegantly behind square. Ashwell Prince slides near the boundary but is touching the rope when he makes contact with the ball. Four signalled there.
Blocked away to the off side
Digs it in short. No ball called
Neatly tucked away to the midwicket gap for a single
good length ball that cuts in from outside off stump, Malik waits on the back foot and defends
Ntini bowls one short of  a length and hits Malik in the mid-riff, Malik was too early on the shot and moved back and across
good length once again and Malik leans forward and drives to mid-off
a touch shorter and Malik dabs it to Peterson at mid-on, it looked like a risky run but Malik is super quick between the wickets
defended on the off side on the front foot
Akmal tries to pull a a fullish delivery and hits it in the air just out of the reach of the man at short leg
Prince takes a blinder, Akmal pulls a short ball from Langeveldt very hard but in the air, Prince dives to his right and takes a sharp catch, that was hit with a lot of power
hits a good length outside off stump and holds its line, Razzaq lifts his bat out of the way
Langeveldt tests Razzaq witha bouncer, he ducks under it with his bat sticking up in the air
poor ball, short and wide outside off stump, that was the slower ball and Razzaq lets it go
fuller ball on middle and leg stump, Razzaq closes the face of the bat and plays it to midwicket
good length just outside the off stump, Razzaq moves back deep in his crease and drives to point
short of  a length angling into the off stump from just outside, Razzaq stands on his toes on the back foot and defends towards cover
Ntini pins Malik on the back foot by banging it in short on off and middle stump, defended on the off side
short ball banged into the ribs, Malik fends it away from his body and wide of Prince at short leg
fuller ball outside off stump, Razzaq gets going by angling the bat and running it down to third man
on a good length angling into off stump, Malik goes right back and defends on the off side
fuller length just outside off stump, Malik has been pinned in his crease and he should ahve played forward to this one, he fended at it and gets beaten

stunning, Jonty Rhodes stands on the balcony and looks proud, Malik smashed a short and wide ball, he smacked the leather off it but Gibbs dove to his right at point and  pulled off a stunning one-handed save
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
full, too full, Razzaq dispatches the half-volley on off stump with a powerful off drive that is placed wide of the fielder at mid off, Razzaq was walking forward as he drove that
Langeveldt comes back well by bowling this short and just outside off stump, Razzaq stands on the back foot and prods at it, the ball beats the edge
strays down leg side and Razzaq clips it off the pads down to the fine leg fence, Pollock - who has just completed a ten-over spell - dives full length on the fence to save a single
over-pitched yet again and Malik leans forward and drives with carefree ease through covers for four more
and again, off the back foot this time, Malik punches through extra cover, he hasn't timed it well enough to get four though, Hall runs after it and keeps the batsmen to three
hits a good length and cuts back into Malik who jumps up and tires to close the face of the bat, the ball flies off the leading edge through gully
short of a length homing in towards off stump, Razzaq waits on the back foot and opens the face, he tries to play it to third man but second slip does the fielding
Razzaq gets beaten by one that rears of a good length and beats him for pace and bounce
full ball angling into off stump, Razzaq  is caught in the crease and ends up letting it go, that was rather close to off stump
bowled full and wide outside off stump, Razzaq shoulders arms
defended to point on the back foot, just one run off the over
Landeveldt dishes out another freebie, full on middle and leg stump, Malik watches it closely and plays a lovely on-drive with a  straight bat, once that beat mid-on there was no stopping it
another very full ball on off stump, Malik gives it a thump but hits it to cover
short of  a length angling into the hips, Malik tucks it through square leg
too short yet again and Langeveldt bowls it wide outside off stump, Razzaq stands on the back foot and punches to cover
Langeveldt pings Razzaq with the bouncer and he ducks under it
and another, this one is much straighter that the previous one that flew over leg stump, Razzaq ducks once again
pitches on a good length and shapes away from the right-hander from just outside off stump, Malik was drawn on to the front foot and drove at it, the ball beat the edge
Malik tries to cut one without moving his feet a fraction, he wasn't even close to it
Hall fires one way down leg side, Boucher dives to his left to make a sharp save
fullish length on middle stump, Malik pushes it off the front foot to midwicket for a single
too full on middle and leg stump, Razzaq plays the on-drive past Kemp at mid-on
tight line and length on off and middle stump, Malik gets forward and defends solidly with bat and pad close together
blocked on the front foot towards cover
straightaway he finds the right line and length outside off stump, Razzaq lets it go
on the shorter side outside off stump and Razzaq drives it off the back foot to Gibbs at point
dabbed with soft hands in front of point for a quick single
Kallis bangs it in short but it is mis-directed down leg side, Malik lets it go easily
short of a length outside off stump, Malik waits on the back foot and defends towards cover
short and wide outside off stump, Malik gets under it and upper-cuts it wide of the fielder on the third man fence
fullish length on off stump, not giving Razzaq any room to play with, he drives on the front foot to mid-off

Hall picks up his first wicket, he drops that a fraction shorter outside off stump, Razzaq doesn't move his feet and swishes his bat away from his body trying to drive it through cover point, he gets an edge that Boucher takes with ease
Hall bowls the identical delivery but Rana Naved, unlike Razzaq, lets it go
fuller length outside off stump, that ball swung away from the right-hander, Rana Naved lets it go again
fuller ball and much straighter, that was angling into off stump and Rana Naved gets half forward and blocks
left alone through to Boucher once more, Hall completes a wicket maiden
good length ball on off stump, Malik gets forward and plays it to point with an open face
tight line and length on off stump, Malik presses forward and defends towards mid-off
Kallis drifts a little on to middle and leg stump, Malik leans across and plays it wide of mid-on for a sharp single
Kallis bangs the effort ball into off and middle stump, defended on the back foot back to the bowler
another one that's on a good length on off stump, Rana Naved defends to the off side
Kallis bowls it fuller outside off stump, Rana Naved gets on the front foot and pushes it to Gibbs at point
fullish ball outside off stump, Shoaib Malik gets forward and drives, Ab de Villiers dives to his right and snuffs out any chance of a run
Malik pushes hard on the front foot and gets a thickish outside edge down to third man
Naved lets one go through close to his off stump
fuller ball but bowled slower than the others, Rana Naved gets forward and drives to mid-off
Hall tosses up another full ball on off stump, Rana Naved drives on the front foot to cover
the slower ball outside off stump, Rana Naved gets on the front foot and tries to smack it through the off side, he gets beaten by the lack of pace
short of a length ball in the channel outside off stump, Malik watches it through to Boucher
fuller length but wide outside off stump, Malik chases it and the ball moves away from him and beats the outside edge
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
shot, sublime, Malik leans forward to meet a slower ball on the full, he drives that elegantly through extra cover for four
edged down to third man for a single, Kallis pushed Malik on the back foot by bowling that shorter
driven on the back foot through covers for a single
short and wide outside off stump, Rana Naved cuts hard off the back foot but hits it straight to point
pushed towards cover on the front foot
Kemp angles the ball into Rana Naved who pushes forward, the ball hits the inside edge and goes through midwicket for two runs
Kemp bowls a loose half-volley outside off stump, Rana Naved gets forward and frees his arms with a text-book cover drive that races to the fence
Kemp bowls it short this time, Rana Naved gets back and cuts to the man on the point fence
tighter line and length on off stump, Malik plays back in his crease and defends with a  straight bat back to Kemp

Kallis bangs the bouncer in, Rana Naved tries to hook but doesn't get into proper position, the ball takes the edge and Boucher roars an appeal after taking the catch, Kallis is confident but Rana Naved isn't happy with the decision
fuller ball angling into the right-hander's off stump, Iftikhar gets forward and plays it through square leg for a single
the slower ball, full and wide outside off stump, Malik reaches out for it and gets an edge down to third man for one
Kallis sends down another short ball, Rao Iftikhar sways out of the way
short of  a length delivery angling into the hips, tucked behind square leg for two more
hits a good length on off stump and bounces on Rao Iftikhar who defends on the back foot
Malik leans forward with the intent to drive but realises that he isn't to the pitch of the ball, he checks his shot and defends it to covers
guided down to third man for a single
excellent line and length, pitches on off stump and shapes away from Rao Iftikhar who prods forward but gets beaten
defended with an open face towards point on the front foot
fuller length on middle and leg stump, pushed in front of midwicket for a sharp single
tight line and length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
short of  a length ball outside off stump, Rao Iftikhar gets behind the line and defends towards point
bowled on a good length but wide outside off stump, Rao Iftikhar gets his front foot forward and lets it go
pitches just outside off stump and jags back into Rao Iftikhar who gets caught on the crease and hit on the pad
defended to point on the back foot
short of  a length ball on off stump, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot, that's five dots in a row now
Kallis bangs it in short and down leg side, Rao Iftikhar moves across his stumps and tries to play it down to fine leg, he gets a bit of glove on it and Boucher accepts the catch with glee
fullish ball swinging away from Malik who pushes forward at it but gets beaten by the swing
Malik charges down the track and hits it over extra cover, the ball falls safely in front of Prince, Malik is showing intent of getting a move on
Asif is all at sea, Kemp pitches it on middle and off stump and angles it away from the left-hander, Asif stands rooted in his crease and hangs his bat out at it, the ball beats the edge
defended back to the bowler, Kemp swung that back into the left-hander
he moves this one away from him, but it's too wide outside off stump
short of a length ball on off stump, Asif pushes it to point on the back foot
full and very wide outside off stump, Asif gets down on one knee and tries to hit it through cover, wide called
a touch shorter in length and Asif flat-bats it to mid off
good length ball outside off stump, Malik runs it down to third man on the front foot but decides not to take the single
full and wide outside off stump, Malik drives powerfully to deep cover but once again declines the run
and again he refuses the single after he drives through cover
Kallis bowls the bouncer and he doesn't have a fine leg, Malik swivels and pulls to the fine leg fence, not very clever from Kallis
pushed to cover on the back foot for a single, Asif has one ball to face
Kallis bowls it short and angles it across Asif who flashes at it and gets an edge over slips and down to third man, Malik turns down the single to retain strike
full and straight from Kemp, Malik drives to long on and takes the single this time, Asif has a possible five balls to negotiate
full ball angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, Asif drives to cover
full again outside off stump, Asif plays the square drive and pierces the gap, AB de Villiers gives chase
defended to cover off the back foot
a touch on the shorter side and Asif cuts off the front foot to point
bowled wide outside off stump, too wide from Kemp
Kemp strays on to the pads this time, Asif clips it off his legs down to the fine leg fence, he'll get two for that and Malik will have strike
good length ball on off stump, keeping Malik back in his crease, defended on the back foot towards the bowler
that was far quicker and it nipped back into Malik from outside off stump, Malik came forward and got hit in the stomach
good length outside off stump, Malik backs away towards square leg and tries to slam it through the off side, he gets beaten
Malik gets on the front foot and plays the square drive to deep point, Malik thinks about the single for a long time and eventually decides to take it
short of  a length on middle and off stump, Asif backs away and cuts to point
good length ball shaping away from Asif, he backs away and tries to cut but gets beaten
short of a length ball on off stump, Malik gets on the back foot and defends on the leg side
full ball angling into off and middle stump, Malik stands his ground and heaves it to long-on, he didn't time that well at all but decides to take the single
full ball on off stump, Asif drives at it and gets a thick edge to third man for a single
short of  a  length ball outside off stump, Malik cuts it down to third man and takes the single
short of a length ball outside off stump, that bounces on Asif who fends at it and gets a thick edge to Boucher, that's the end of that!

inn2.comm: starts off with a  wide, that was perhaps a bit too harsh, that pitched outside off stump and moved further away from Smith

Asif strikes with his first legitimate ball! And what a snorter of a ball, it burst off a good length outside off stump and angled away from Smith, he poked at it and nicked it to Akmal, that one cut viciously off the pitch, it was unplayable
fuller in length seaming into the right-hander, Kallis pushes it to cover and sets off for a single, Rana Naved fires the throw in at the bowler's end but misses
good length ball pushes AB de Villiers on the back foot and he defends back to the bowler
pitches short of a length outside off stump and seams away a long way from de Villiers, he lets it go
this one cuts back a little off a good length, de Villiers tries to cut and gets cramped for room, the ball beats the bottom edge
de Villiers makes an emphatic reply, a fraction short and de Villiers latches on to it and pulls it hard in front of midwicket for four
too full and swinging into Kallis who closes the face and plays it through midwicket for a single
hits a good length outside off stump and shapes away from de Villiers who watches it closely and lets it go, that carried through very nicely to Akmal
fuller length and the line is straighter too, de Villiers plays back and defends to the off side
you just can't bowl there, no matter who is batting, Iftikhar drifts on to middle and leg and errs on the fuller side, de Villiers clips it off his toes and sends it racing to the midwicket fence
left alone outside the off stump, this time Iftikhar was shorter in length and the line was outside off stump

de Villiers tried to leave this again outside off stump but the ball was on to him quicker than he expected, he was late in pulling his bat out of the way and the ball hit the edge and ran down to third man
oh my! Asif pitches on a good length and it cuts back sharply into de Villiers who expected it to shape away, that bounced over the top of off stump
Asif fires this down leg side and concedes a wide, he fired one down leg side in the last game too, that went for five wides
Asif drops this a fraction short and wide outside off stump, de Villiers transfers his weight on to the back foto and cuts hard through point for four more
too straight this time and Asif gets clipped through the vacant midwicket region, Inzamam does have protection on the fence
Kallis gets forward to defend to the off side and steal a single, Asif goes up in appeal because he thinks the ball hit the pad before the bat, that was a close call
good length ball on off stump, de Villiers gets behind the line and defends with a  straight bat back to the bowler
another one cuts back sharply into de Villiers from outside off stump, he lets it go through to Akmal who collects it on the second bounce
short of a length ball outside off stump, Kallis jumps back and tries to play it behind point, he gets a bottom edge to the slip cordon
that lifts sharply from outside off stump, Kallis lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
what's Kallis upto? He charges down the pitch and tries to smash it down the ground with a  flat bat, he misses the ball by a long way
defended into the covers on the back foot
pitches in the channel outside off stump and seams away from Kallis who lets it go
defended on the back foot back to the bowler, Iftikhar finishes a maiden.
Asif fires it down leg side again, this time the ball brushes the pad and Akmal dives to his left to save leg byes
in the corridor outside off stump and that moves away from the right-hander after hitting the deck, de Villiers lets it go
Asif needs to tinker with his radar, he fires another one down leg side but this time it's called wide
that almost shaved off stump! de Villiers got a stride in and cover his off stump, the ball pitched on a good length outside off and nipped back into de Villiers, well-judged leave in the end
a touch too full and de Villiers unleashes a majestic cover drive but picks out the man in the in-field
that one kept very low and de Villiers played all over it, luckily for him the line was outside off stump
de Villiers gets forward and drives firmly towards mid-ff, Rana Naved dives across from extra cover to save a certain boundary
hits a good length outside off stump, Kallis lets it go
played to point on the back foot
good length  ball close to off stump, Kallis plays back and lets it go
Kallis once again comes down the track and tries to flog it over extra cover, Iftikhar sees him coming and bowls it shorter and beats Kallis
that shoots up from a good length and hits Kallis on the hip, Iftikhar is bowling at a handy pace too, Kallis doesn't look entirely comfortable
drifts down leg side and the ball hits Kallis on the pad for a leg bye behind square leg, that extra was the only run in the over
Asif bowls it a little too full but the movement into Kallis induces a thick inside edge to mid-on
bowled on a good length outside off stump, Kallis gets forward and leaves it for Akmal to collect
the edge doesn't carry! That cuts back into Kallis from outside off stump, Kallis plays inside the line and gets an outside edge to second slip
short of a length ball on off stump, Kallis stands on the back foot and defends, he gets an inside edge on to pad
good length ball wide outside off stump, inviting Kallis to have a go at it, Kallis plants his front foot forward and resists the temptation

dreadful mix-up, slower ball on off stump, Kallis pushes it to point and sets off for a single, he then hesitates, de Villiers also hesitates and both batsmen are in the middle, they decide to go through with the run and the fielder at point misses the stumps
left alone outside off stump
rears up from a good length outside off stump, Kallis lets it go again
and once more, Iftikhar is keeping it very tight outside off stump, Kallis moves back and leaves it
fantastic! scintillating shot, Kallis makes room and blasts a short of  a length ball flat and far over the cover fence, Kallis breaks the shackles that Iftikhar has had on him
Kallis makes room again but Iftikhar bounces him, Kallis pulls even though he is cramped for room and connects well, he gets four to deep backward square
and again, this time Kallis flicks a fuller ball off his pads through midwicket, Kallis has broken free and Iftikhar, who bowled two consecutive maidens before this, is feeling the heat
short of a length ball on off and middle stump, de Villiers dabs it through midwicket for a single
majestic! Kallis gets a firm stride in, Asif strays on the fuller side and the ball thuds off the middle of Kallis's bat and speeds to the long-off fence
and once more, Kallis leans forward and drives with sublime ease past Asif, mid-off dives despairingly but the ball beats him and races to the fence
Asif bowls this one shorter and Kallis stands on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
fuller length angling into Kallis's off and middle stump, he plays it inside out and drives to cover
Asif bowls it full again and Kallis once more moves forward and drives with the full face of his broad bat, this time he hits it straight to mid-off
good length ball in the channel outside off stump, de Villiers tries to play the square drive but gets cramped for room ,he ends up pushing it towards cover
the length was not on for the pull short, it was much too full, de Villiers tried to slap it through midwicket but the ball beat him
fuller length again and far too straight, de Villiers pushes it off his pads through midwicket
Iftikhar strays on to middle and leg and Kallis flicks off his pads to the man at deep midwicket for the single
that nips back from a good length and hits de Villiers high on the pad, Iftikhar appeals for lbw but no one else is interested for it was far too high and missing leg stump
short of a length ball on off and middle stump, de Villiers moves back in his crease and defends to mid-on
hits a good length right away but the line is too straight, Kallis tucks it off his pads through square leg for a single
Rana Naved over-steps and bowls it a fraction short, de Villiers is so quick to get into position and nudge it through the vacant midwicket region for three
in the corridor outside off stump, Kallis lets it go
full length and outside off stump, Kallis gets forward and tries to punch to cover, instead he gets an inside edge through square leg
Rana Naved over-steps yet again, the ball was a jaffer though, pitched on  a good length and had de Villiers in two minds whether to play at it, he ends up checking his shot
fuller length on the pads, clipped to midwicket on the front foot
a fraction short this time outside off stump, de Villiers gets on the back foot and drives to point
fuller length on middle and off stump, de Villiers plays back and the ball moves a fraction away from him off the pitch and squares him up
tight line and length on off and middle stump, Kallis gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler on the front foot
drifts on to middle and leg and Kallis turns it through square leg for a single
good length ball pitching outside off stump and seaming away from de Villiers who lets it go through to Akmal
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
that was in the channel outside off stump and it kept low as well, de Villiers moves on to the back foot and pushes it to point
de Villiers smashes that hard into the ground and straight at Imran Nazir at cover who gets his hand to it but lets the ball go past him
fullish length on off stump, de Villiers plays back in his crease and blocks to the off side
Rana Naved over-steps for the third time and de Villiers makes him pay, it was too full on middle and leg stump and de Villiers hits through the line and collects for to long on

massive massive appeal for lbw but de Villiers might have got an inside edge on that one, he missed the pull shot and got hit on the back leg, close call, it may have been a bit too high as well, it was certainly not short enough to pull
played behind square on the leg side for a single
pitches in the channel outside off stump and seams away from the right-hander who lets it go through to Akmal
Kallis takes a step forward and Rana Neved sends him a short one, Kallis fends it down on the leg side and races through for a single
slightly shorter in length outside off stump, de Villiers gets on the back foot and drives to cover
good length on middle and off stump, Kallis tucks it off his pads behind square on the leg side for  a single
blocked on the back foot back to the bowler
pitches on a good length outside off stump and cuts into de Villiers who should have played forward rather than back to that one, he gets a thick outside edge past slip and down to third man
Kallis gets forward and is hit on the pad, Pakistan appeal for leg before but Kallis got a bit of bat on that one
good length ball on off stump, Kallis plays from deep in his crease and defends towards cover
good length once again but the line drifts on to middle and leg, Kallis moves across his stumps and defends to midwicket
de Villiers gets on the front foot and drives firmly to mid-off, he timed that well and should have placed it better
de Villiers transfers his weight on the back foot and pulls with one leg in the air down to deep square leg
too short adn too wide, easy meat for Kallis who jumps back in his crease and drives off the back foot through cover point for four
too full this time and Kallis leans forward and drives, he splits the gap between extra cover and cover and finds  the boundary again
defended on the front foot to cover
Rana Naved bowls that shorter in length and Kallis was very early on the pull shot, he had nearly finished the stroke by the time the ball crashed into his stomach
strays on to middle and leg stump, worked through midwicket for one
straighter line on off stump, Kallis gets a stride in and defends towards cover
Kallis moves forward and across his stumps, Razzaq digs it in short and Kallis fends it down behind square on the leg side
good length ball on off and middle stump, de Villiers moves back in his crease and plays it to midwicket
Razzaq now over-steps, that one is wide outside off stump as well, de Villiers lets it go
good length ball angling into off and middle stump from just outside, de Villiers is quick to move on the back foot and close the face to play it to midwicket
too full from Razzaq and de Villiers drives it hard back at Kallis at the non-striker's end, he jumps out of the way and mid-on runs across to cut off any runs
defended to point on the back foot
bowled on a good length but dead straight on off stump, Kallis gets behind the line and defends solidly to cover
short of a length ball down leg side, Kallis moves inside the line of the ball and plays it to fine leg
short of a length again on middle and leg stump, de Villiers this time tucks it off his hips to fine leg
good length ball on off stump, Kallis pushes hard at it but gets an outside edge past first slip and down to third man for two more
fuller in length adn just outside off stump, Kallis gets half a stride in and drives to mid-off, he didn't time that as well as he would have liked
de Villiers gets on to the back foot and punches wide of the man at mid off for a single
short of a length ball just outside off stump, Kallis frees his arms and tries to drive but gets more of a thick edge to third man
Kallis drives on the up and though he didn't time that perfectly he picked the gap at cover
dabbed to mid-off for a quick single
fuller length on off stump, de Villiers get forward and drives wide of Iftikhar at mid-off for another single
fullish length on off stump, Kallis covers the line and drives firmly past Razzaq to mid-off
another no-ball, his third if I'm not mistaken, de Villiers tries to force it through the off side but gets an inside edge
Rana Naved replies with a well-directed bouncer, de Villier shaped to play a pull shot but bailed out at the last minute
this time there's no question of bailing out, Rana Naved bowls a half-tracker and de Villiers frees his arms, swings his bat and sends it soaring over the midwicket fence
the slower ball, de Villiers charges down the track and reaches out to play it, the ball takes the inside edge to square leg
de Villiers presses forward adn gets hit on the pad, Rana Naved appeals for leg before but there was an inside edge
Kallis dabs it with soft hands in front of point for a single to reach his 59th half-century, it's been an attacking innings punctuated with some belligerent shots

Rana Naved bowls another slower one to de Villiers but thsi time it's too short and wide, de Villiers waits for it and cuts hard to the point fence, that shot brings up the 100 partnership between these two
defended on the off side on the front foot
good length ball on off stump, Kallis leans forward and drives back to the bowler
good length ball once again on off stump, Kallis defends with a  straight bat towards cover
slower ball fired down leg side, Kallis moves a long way across and works it to fine leg, that's his 8000th ODI run
defended to midwicket off the back foot
you just can't bowl there at this level, Razzaq drifts down leg side again and de Villiers helps it along to the fine leg fence, runs don't come much easier than those
and he too slips down leg side, wide called
pushed through quickly outside off stump, Kallis gets forward and defends
lots of turn there! Kallis lunged forward at one that pitched outside off stump, it turned sharply and hit Kallis on the pad and went past Akmal for leg byes
Kallis gets down on one knee and paddles it from outside off stump to short fine leg
pitches on off and middle and spins into Kallis who gets hit on the pad

Kallis dabs it to short third man and sets off for a risky single, de Villiers is quick but had there been a direct hit at the keeper's  end he would have been out, as it happened the throw wasn't direct and when Akmal whipped off the bails, de Villiers was safe, loud cheers from the crowd as the third umpire flashes not out
pitches on off and spins into middle and leg, de Villiers works it off his pads behind square on the leg side
Razzaq bowls it short of  a length and angles it in to middle and leg, de Villiers whips it thought midwicket and moves on to 48
driven on the back foot to cover
Razzaq puts a little more effort into that one and bowls it in the channel outside off stump, Kallis defends it on the off side
Kallis tries to pull but gets beaten, that was too far outside the off stump for that shot
Kallis jumps across outside the off stump and steers a short of a length ball from outside off through the leg side
short balla nd de Villiers pulls it through square leg for  a single, he moves on to 49 and will be on strike for the next over

full ball on off and middle stump, de Villiers leans forward and works it through the gap at midwicket, fifty runs for him and an attractive innings it was, that's his sixth half-century and this third of the series
too full and Kallis gets forward and smashes it past Inzamam at cover for four
steered behind point for a single
de Villiers tries to play it to midwicket and gets an inside edge on to pad
played to short fine leg on the back foot
de Villiers goes airborne! He charges down the pitch, gets to the pitch of the ball and with a flourish of his bat lofts Malik back over the long-on fence
good length ball on off stump, Kallis walks across his stumps and dabs it to the leg side for one
Razzaq over-steps and bounces Kallis, tha ball shoots off the pitch and flies over Akmal who just gets a glove on it
defende don the off side on the back foot, that reared up off a good length and caught him on the hop
and this one keeps very low outsid ethe off stump and had de Villiers in a spot of bother
Razzaq pitches on middle and strays on to leg, de Villiers works it off his pads and Kallis calls him through for two
picthes on a good length outside off stump, de Villiers lets it go through to Akmal
another one keeps low, de Villiers does extremely well to work it from off and middle stump to deep square leg
slips down leg side, wide called
another ball keeps dreadfully low, de Villiers plays it to midwicket
driven on the front foot through midwicket for a single
tossed up on off stump, Kallis gets forward and drives to cover
steered to point on the front foot for one more
de Villiers leans forward and works one from off stump to deep midwicket for one
pushed through midwicket on the front foot for one
tossed up on off stump, Kallis moves across and works it through midwicket for one
pushed through quicker on leg stump, de Villiers plays back and turns it to short fine leg
played off the pads through square leg for one
dabbed with soft hands to point for a single
slips down leg side, de Villiers moves across and tickles it to short fine leg
tossed up on middle stump, de Villiers leans forward and drives to deep midwicket for a single to retain strike
de Villiers turns it to short fine leg for one, but Pakistan concede overthrows as well, their body language is non-existant at the moment
drifts down leg side, he gets away with that one
defended to cover on the front foot
played to short third man, de Villiers wanted the single and set off, Kallis sends him back but the throw came to the wrong end
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
pushed to midwicket on the front foot
Kallis pushes Hafeez on the front foot to mid-on
defended to short leg on the front foot
Kallis steps down the pitch and lofts Hafeez just over the fielder at mid-off for four, just four needed now
dabbed in front of point for a single, that takes South Africa to 151, just three runs away from taking the series
Kallis steers it behind point for one more run
victory for South Africa, de Villiers nudges it late and nudges it fine and times it well enough for the ball to scurry to the third man fence
